events.name: I/O Extended 2017 Minna
events.description: We will be bringing the immersive experience focused on exploring the next generation of tech at Google IO to our community since its obvious not everyone will be opportuned to attend the main event at Shoreline Amphitheatre Mountain View, California. GDG Minna will host the keynote as well as some technical sessions. Come along with your coding gears because we will also be having codelabs session.

events.name: North Central DevFest 2017
events.description:
North Central DevFest is our annual all-day Developer Festival focusing on Google recent technological trends including but not limited to the following:

- Mobile Development (Android and Tooling)

- UI/UX Featuring Material Design

- Web/PWA/AMP/Firebase

- Google Cloud

- Machine Learning (TensorFlow, Vision API)

North Central DevFest 2017 will be organized as a typical DevFest in the Month of November featuring Speakers from our cluster of participating chapters and the community at large to attain a bigger impact in the developer community.

North Central DevFest 2017 will be organized as a typical DevFest in the Month of November featuring Speakers from our cluster of participating chapters and the community at large to attain a bigger impact in the developer community.

events.name: Getting Started With Git
events.description:
During this Meetup, we will be introducing you our attendees to Version Control Systems including Git and Mecurial, you will know more about hosting your repos in Atlassian Bitbucket and also leveraging on Bitbucket for easy usage. 2 Awesome speakers with experience using Git and Mecurial will be on stage to give us a hands-on introduction to Git and Mecurial two of the most popular Version Control Systems. If you are in or Around Minna please make it a date with us.

Please come along with you laptops

events.name: StudyJam: Mobile Site Certification
events.description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.

Mobile Site Certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. It allows individuals to demonstrate that Google recognises them as an expert in mobile sites.

• What to bring
LAPTOP
CHARGER
NOTEBOOK

• Important to know

events.name: IWD Minna (International Womens Day) 2018
events.description:
• What we'll do
International Women’s Day, which is officially on March 8, 2018, is a day to celebrate the achievements of women while calling for greater equality within our communities. As Women Techmakers powered by Google Developer Groups Minna (GDG Minna), we plan to do this by improving our programs thus increasing women GDG members through increased collaboration and raising awareness through social media.

Women are no longer comfortable taking the back seat in STEM and getting little or no recognition for their work. Instead, we are working harder and harder to be accepted, recognized and celebrated for our contributions to the technological ecosystems in our communities. So, this year’s theme “Building a New Horizon” is indeed very apt as it represents the global move women are making in technology.

• What to bring

• Important to know

events.name: Google I/O Extended Minna
events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer conference intended to enrich participants with new Google Technologies. Since not everyone can make it all the way to San Francisco, so to bring I/O into local communities worldwide, GDGs are organizing event series called I/O Extended. The event will bring local developer community together to experience talks and watch keynote from the IO, Product demos, Speaker Sessions and Codelabs.

*We Plan to do:
- Flutter
- Firebase
- Kotlin

events.name: Flutter StudyJam Minna

venue.name: Trade Fair Complex, Paiko Road, Minna, Niger State.
venue.address_2: Trade Fair Complex, Paiko Road, Minna, Niger State.

events.description:
Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join us for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll work through Flutter Udacity Course prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals..

Bring a laptop! The course will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, the laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine.
Check out : https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

events.name: Cloud Study Jam 19 Minna

venue.name: Paritie Hub
venue.address_1: C1 Minna GSM Village, Opp Federal High Court Minna. · Minna

events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

events.name: IWD Minna 2019

venue.name: Paritie Hub
venue.address_1: C1 Minna GSM Village, Opp Federal High Court Minna. · Minna

events.description:
We are proud to be hosting the 2019 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

Women Techmakers Minna celebrates international women's day (IWD) to highlight the talent of women in technology which focuses on community-building initiative to promote talented and passionate women, increase their visibility and empower them with resources in technology to develop and excel in their careers.

Contact:[masked],[masked] for further details.

events.name: Kotlin/Everywhere Minna 19

venue.name: Paritie Hub
venue.address_1: C1 Minna GSM Village, Opp Federal High Court Minna. · Minna

events.description:
Want to get started with Kotlin, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Kotlin/Everywhere event.
Together we'll work through several Android / Google Cloud / multi-platform labs. You will get hands-on experience with Kotlin in Android, multi-platform with Kotlin/Native, Google Cloud Platform and Kotlin/JS.

What to bring to the event:
+ Laptop — Mac, PC, Chromebook, Linux, everyone's welcome.
+ Laptop charger.
+ The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, use Firefox or Chrome.

Looking forward to seeing you at the event!

#KotlinEverywhere

events.description:
DevFests are community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas and technologies, including hack-a-thons, codelabs, and more.

The event is the biggest tech event in Minna, our team work hard to make DevFest an awesome experience and a phenomenal atmosphere. We will be featuring contents in software development covering Android, Web, Kotlin, Google Maps and Flutter technologies

events.name: Flutter Interact Minna 2019

venue.name: Paritie Hub
venue.address_1: C1 Minna GSM Village, Opp Federal High Court Minna. · Minna

events.description:
We’ll showcase the latest from Google Design and Flutter, Google’s free and open source UI toolkit to build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop - all from a single codebase

With viewing parties around the world, everyone can be a part of this interactive event that focuses on sharing ideas, experimenting and crafting beautiful experiences across devices.

events.name: Women Techmakers Minna Meet & Greet

venue.name: Paritie Hub
venue.address_1: C1 Minna GSM Village, Opp Federal High Court Minna. · Minna

events.description:
Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology.
The WTM Minna Meet & Greet is an avenue for the members of the community to know themselves better, learn from one another and understand our individual tech needs in order to plan activities around these moving forward.

Expectations:
- Meet with other women from the community.

- Share our stories: How did we get here? Our challenges, victories and the journey so far?

- Share our tech interests and find people with similar interests.

- What do we want to learn in 2020? [Android, Web, Data, Design]

Customized programs will be developed for the WTM Minna Community in 2020 as a result of this activity.

upcoming.name: Firebase Study Jam for Web
upcoming.description:
With a Firebase Study Jam, your community members will learn capabilities of using Firebase for developing Web applications, share their experiences, and solve hands-on problems together. Firebase Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn this hot technology in person.

Who should attend?

Firebase Study Jam is best suited for:

1) those just getting started with developing web apps for desktop and mobile
2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks

upcoming.name: IWD Minna 2020
upcoming.description:
What is International Women’s Day?
International Women’s Day (IWD) is marked every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women’s economic, political, and social achievements.
